channel.title: Please help me with color SPECIAL ATTACK
channel.description:
Hello! Please help me with color I need to replace my S P E C I A L A T T A C K Screen to old Screen Runescape speacial attack , it was green, and when 0 energy it was red. http://img707.imageshack.us/i/ttttt2.gif/ http://img135.imageshack.us/i/ttttt1.gif/
Identical color when at me full energy, 100, 75, 50, 25, 0 %
I use battlescape
At it isn't present Sprites Only:files and this folders:ada, cache, javazoom, models, sign, theme.
